activities: Fugro is a global engineering, survey, subsea and geosciences company headquartered in the Netherlands.  Fugro does business as Fugro NV at the global holding level and has affiliated and owned organizations in more than 60 countries globally, including several EU member nations.  Fugro (USA) Inc. is a sub-holding entity of Fugro NV located in Houston, Texas.  Fugro (USA) Inc. was the first Fugro entity to implement the the human resources information system (HRIS) which will be deployed globally in Fugro.  As such, the HRIS hardware and software is located and managed within the USA.  As the global HRIS expands to other countries including but not limited to those in the EU, Fugro (USA) Inc will be the recipient of employee related data to transact normal administrative business via the HRIS system.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, United Kingdom
personaldata: Employee related data via the HRIS system or other data to transact internal company business.
